Contact.contact: If you have any questions or uncertainties about the data, please contact us on the following contact details:

Login.verificationsuccess: Your email address has been verified. You can now log in.

PC.foundin: Found in the basement for measuring the water level
PC.foundon: The UUID found on the back of the device.
PC.keyon: The security key found within an email sent to the user.
PC.securityexplain: The security level of the device. This is used to determine the access level of the device.
PC.statusexplain: The current status of the device. This is used to determine if the device is connected to the server.
PC.uuidexplain: The UUID is a unique identifier for the device. This is used to connect the device to the server.

Register.emailmax: The email may not be greater than 50 characters
Register.emailtaken: The email is already in use
Register.emailvalid: The email must be a valid email address
Register.error: Something went wrong, please try again later.
Register.firstnamemax: The first name may not be greater than 50 characters
Register.firstnamemin: The first name must be at least 2 characters
Register.lastnamemax: The last name may not be greater than 50 characters
Register.lastnamemin: The last name must be at least 2 characters
Register.passwordcomplex: The password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number and one special character
Register.passwordmax: The password may not be greater than 250 characters
Register.passwordmin: The password must be at least 8 characters
Register.servererror: Something went wrong while processing your request. Please try again later.
Register.success: You have successfully registered. A confirmation email has been sent to your email address. After confirming your email address, you can log in.
